hymn.title: When I'm with the saints
hymn.category: The Church—Building by the Growth in Life

layout.singingstanza: When I'm with the saints, Hap -- py am I! Peace -- ful am I! Rest -- ful am I! When I'm with the saints, Joy -- ful am I! A joy I can't de -- ny!

lyrics.stanza: When I'm with the saints, Happy am I! Peaceful am I! Restful am I! When I'm with the saints, Joyful am I! A joy I can't deny!
When I'm with the saints, Christ we pursue! Seeking for You! Here loving You! When I'm with the saints, Christ we do share! And for each member care!
When I'm with the saints, Christ we employ! Without alloy! Christ we enjoy! When I'm with the saints, Hopeful am I! They are my life supply!
When I'm with the saints, Christ in them see! Our hope is He! Hope of glory! When I'm with the saints, Foretaste have we! Conformed to Him we'll be!
When I'm with the saints, Christ we await! Anticipate! Lord, don't be late! When I'm with the saints, For Christ we yearn! We long for His return!
When I'm with the saints, You will go on! I will go on! Let's all go on! When I'm with the saints, This we affirm! We live if you stand firm!
